text: Jan Kilian (27 December 1953 - 28 November 2020) was a Polish politician and businessman. He was a member of the Law and Justice Party. Kilian was born in Starogard Gdański, Poland. He was a member of the Sejm from 2015 until 2019. Kilian died on 28 November 2020 at the age of 66.Nie żyje Jan Kilian. title: Jan Kilian (politician)
